name: Underwater mini 3D
description:
”Underwater mini”is a swimming simulator.

Gamepad  Support (Is Not Full controller support.)

Feature：Simply mini game

While Swimming, collect sea urchin in the water.

How to play:

Keyboard

'WASD' to move

'Mouse' to direct

Gamepad

'Left Thumb Axis' to move

'Right Thumb Axis' to direct

Contact

Email: inamyharmony617@gmail.com

Youtube: 周雨涵

I love sea urchin!
